Question: This person met and fell in love with Mamie Geneva Doud of Boone, Iowa, six years his junior, while he was stationed in Texas.
Hints: This person told Kennedy he considered Laos to be "the cork in the bottle" with regard to the regional threat.
On March 31, this person's body was returned to the National Cathedral, where he was given an Episcopal Church funeral service.
USS ****, the second Nimitz-class supercarrier, was named in his honor.
